name: 李韋皞
objective:
本課程從礦物的化學成分、化學鍵及其晶體結構之理論詳細討論礦物的物理及化學性質。再就各項理化性質在選礦、冶煉、化工製造及其它物理加工等方面之應用分別舉例介紹。
Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms, and crystal structures.  Application examples are introduced in the fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical industry, etc...
schedule:
Week 1/ Preparation & Course Introduction
Week 2/ Minerals and Their Chemical Classification
Week 3/ Mineral Crystals and Structural Classification
Week 4/ Mineral Chemistry
Week 5/ Physical Properties
Week 6/ Optical Mineralogy and Its Uses
Week 7/ Special Mineral Properties and Related Structures
Week 8/ Descriptive Mineralogy
Week 9/ Energetics, Thermodynamics and Stability of Minerals
Week 10/ Origin of Minerals and Their Transformations in Nature under Various Environmental Conditions
Week 11/ Mineral Deposits and Their Characteristics
Week 12/ Marine Minerals in Different Environments
Week 13/ Minerals and Mineral Associations as Geothermometers and Geobarometers
Week 14/ Common Analytical Techniques in Mineralogical Studies
Week 15/ Precious and Semiprecious Stones
Week 16/ Mineralogy in Exploration of Mineral Deposits Using Magnetic, Electrical, and Gravitational Properties
Week 17/ Synthesis of Selected Minerals (Crystals) in Laboratory and Industry
Week 18/ Concept of Geomedicine and Medicinal Mineralogy
materials: Swapna Mukherjee, Applied Mineralogy (Applications in industry and environment), Springer, 2011.
